comment: Dr. Faver really makes sure you get the material. His lectures are theory-heavy but good and help you understand everything deeply. Weekly problem sets and quizzes, plus three exams total (with final). Out of the 12 quizzes, your 3 lowest scores get dropped. Just make sure you're locked in during class, do the homework, and you should be ok

Honestly the worst professor out there his teaching style is abysmal and his lectures are more about writing down fast enough before he erases it off the board than actually learning. He acts extremely pretentiously and it feels like he does not care for his student nor for their well being. STAY AWAY
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Although he's smart in PDEs, Dr.Faver goes so fast in the lectures that he leaves little to no time for questions if we don't understand and is not the best at answering. You'll suffer from tedious HWs (textbook and daily log, from website, 35%) without lots of studying and reading from both. Avoid if this is not your cup of tea.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: I adored Dr.Faver's class. He was the best professor I have ever taken in my 3 years in college. His feedback is so thought-out and he genuinely wants each student to feel comfortable succeeding. There is no question he will not take the time to answer and do so thoroughly. I can not recommend him enough and hope to have him again in the future!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Faver was the best math teacher that I've had at KSU. He does do 2 projects, but he's an easy grader with them. If you make an effort for your grade, he acknowledges that, and will be easier on you. If you're struggling go to his office during hours! I promise it helps more than you know. Dr. Faver as a person is just as amazing.

Would 100% say he is the best math teacher i've ever had. The only time in my life where I learned so much in the class that I barely had to study for the final. He makes classes very enjoyable and engaging. Seriously TAKE HIM.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class
